summary: Resolved all recent DB errors by adding missing columns/tables: items.price/discount, banners.created_by, users.cm_firebase_token, orders.user_id; created discounts, coupons, store_schedule tables; migrations applied and DevTestFixtureSeeder updated (price/discount/cm_firebase_token).
